## HostBehavior interface

Represents an object that can contribute behavior to a host.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface HostBehavior<TSource = any> 
```

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[addedCallback(controller)?](../fast-element.hostbehavior.addedcallback/)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Executed when this behavior is attached to a controller.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[connectedCallback(controller)?](../fast-element.hostbehavior.connectedcallback/)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Executed when this behavior's host is connected.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[disconnectedCallback(controller)?](../fast-element.hostbehavior.disconnectedcallback/)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Executed when this behavior's host is disconnected.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[removedCallback(controller)?](../fast-element.hostbehavior.removedcallback/)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Executed when this behavior is detached from a controller.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
